local_intent: Execute the transfer stroke: align to the T-block, set tool yaw for a lateral push, and push the block with one retry if needed.
assumptions: Planar push requires yaw=90 for direction 180 per global policy
Perception provides a valid pose for alignment
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence segment: detect block, align, set yaw=90, then push with RetryUntilSuccessful(num_attempts=2).
